briefdescription.para: Use the last object list received by the server as the one being read.
Clear the data from the object list stored on the server.
Set the pid attached to the ObjectList.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID to whom the object list should be attached.

briefdescription.para: Take the contents of the read-only object list last received by the server from a player and move its contents to the stored object list that can be sent by the server.
Get the number of indexes in the read object list.
Get the origin of the read object list.

simplesect.para: The origin (0 for CLIENT_GAMEPLAY, 1 for CLIENT_CONSOLE, 2 for CLIENT_DIALOGUE, 3 for CLIENT_SCRIPT_LOCAL, 4 for CLIENT_SCRIPT_GLOBAL, 5 for SERVER_SCRIPT).

briefdescription.para: Get the client script that the read object list originated from.

simplesect.para: The ID of the client script.

briefdescription.para: Get the action type used in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The action type (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE, 3 for REQUEST).

briefdescription.para: Get the console command used in the read object list.
Get the container subaction type used in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The action type (0 for NONE, 1 for DRAG, 2 for DROP, 3 for TAKE_ALL).

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list is a player.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Although most player data and events are dealt with in Player packets, object activation is general enough for players themselves to be included as objects in ObjectActivate packets.

simplesect.para: Whether the object is a player.

briefdescription.para: Get the player ID of the object at a certain index in the read object list, only valid if the object is a player.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Currently, players can only be objects in ObjectActivate and ConsoleCommand packets.

simplesect.para: The player ID of the object.

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the refNum of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the mpNum of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the count of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the charge of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the enchantment charge of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the soul of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the gold value of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

detaileddescription.para: This is used solely to get the gold value of gold. It is not used for other objects.

briefdescription.para: Get the object scale of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the object sound ID of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the object state of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the door state of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the lock level of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the dialogue choice type for the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the dialogue choice topic for the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the gold pool of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the hour of the last gold restock of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The hour of the last gold restock.

briefdescription.para: Get the day of the last gold restock of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The day of the last gold restock.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has been activated by a player.

simplesect.para: Whether the object has been activated by a player.

briefdescription.para: Get the player ID of the player activating the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The player ID of the activating player.

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the actor activating the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The refId of the activating actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the refNum of the actor activating the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The refNum of the activating actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the mpNum of the actor activating the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The mpNum of the activating actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the actor activating the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The name of the activating actor.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has been hit successfully.
Get the damage caused to the object at a certain index in the read object list in a hit.
Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has blocked the hit on it.
Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has been knocked down.
Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has been hit by a player.

simplesect.para: Whether the object has been hit by a player.

briefdescription.para: Get the player ID of the player hitting the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The player ID of the hitting player.

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the actor hitting the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The refId of the hitting actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the refNum of the actor hitting the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The refNum of the hitting actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the mpNum of the actor hitting the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The mpNum of the hitting actor.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the actor hitting the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The name of the hitting actor.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list is a summon.

detaileddescription.para: Only living actors can be summoned.

briefdescription.para: Get the summon effect ID of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the summon spell ID of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the summon duration of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Returns -1 if indefinite.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has a player as its summoner.

detaileddescription.para: Only living actors can be summoned.

simplesect.para: Whether a player is the summoner of the object.

briefdescription.para: Get the player ID of the summoner of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The player ID of the summoner.

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the actor summoner of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the refNum of the actor summoner of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the mpNum of the actor summoner of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the X position of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the Y position of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the Z position at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the X rotation of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the Y rotation of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the Z rotation of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the videoFilename of the object at a certain index in the read object list.
Get the number of client local variables of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The number of client local variables.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int variableIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetClientLocalInternalIndex

briefdescription.para: Get the internal script index of the client local variable at a certain variableIndex in the client locals of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the client local.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int variableIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetClientLocalVariableType

briefdescription.para: Get the type of the client local variable at a certain variableIndex in the client locals of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the client local.

simplesect.para: The variable type (0 for INTEGER, 1 for LONG, 2 for FLOAT).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int variableIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetClientLocalIntValue

briefdescription.para: Get the integer value of the client local variable at a certain variableIndex in the client locals of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the client local.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int variableIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetClientLocalFloatValue

briefdescription.para: Get the float value of the client local variable at a certain variableIndex in the client locals of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the client local.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of container item indexes of the object at a certain index in the read object list.

simplesect.para: The number of container item indexes.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemRefId

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemCount

briefdescription.para: Get the item count of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemCharge

briefdescription.para: Get the charge of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemEnchantmentCharge

briefdescription.para: Get the enchantment charge of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemSoul

briefdescription.para: Get the soul of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetContainerItemActionCount

briefdescription.para: Get the action count of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the read object list.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has a container.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Only ObjectLists from ObjectPlace packets contain this information. Objects from received ObjectSpawn packets can always be assumed to have a container.

simplesect.para: Whether the object has a container.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the object at a certain index in the read object list has been dropped by a player.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Only ObjectLists from ObjectPlace packets contain this information.

simplesect.para: Whether the object has been dropped by a player.

briefdescription.para: Set the cell of the temporary object list stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: The cell is determined to be an exterior cell if it fits the pattern of a number followed by a comma followed by another number.

briefdescription.para: Set the action type of the temporary object list stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The action type (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE, 3 for REQUEST).

briefdescription.para: Set the container subaction type of the temporary object list stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The action type (0 for NONE, 1 for DRAG, 2 for DROP, 3 for TAKE_ALL, 4 for REPLY_TO_REQUEST, 5 for RESTOCK_RESULT).

briefdescription.para: Set the console command of the temporary object list stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: When sent, the command will run once on every object added to the object list. If no objects have been added, it will run once without any object reference.

briefdescription.para: Set the refId of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the refNum of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Every object loaded from .ESM and .ESP data files has a unique refNum which needs to be retained to refer to it in packets.
On the other hand, objects placed or spawned via the server should always have a refNum of 0.

briefdescription.para: Set the mpNum of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Every object placed or spawned via the server is assigned an mpNum by incrementing the last mpNum stored on the server. Scripts should take care to ensure that mpNums are kept unique for these objects.
Objects loaded from .ESM and .ESP data files should always have an mpNum of 0, because they have unique refNumes instead.

briefdescription.para: Set the object count of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: This determines the quantity of an object, with the exception of gold.

briefdescription.para: Set the charge of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Object durabilities are set through this value.

briefdescription.para: Set the enchantment charge of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Object durabilities are set through this value.

briefdescription.para: Set the soul of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the gold value of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: This is used solely to set the gold value for gold. It has no effect on other objects.

briefdescription.para: Set the scale of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Objects are smaller or larger than their default size based on their scale.

briefdescription.para: Set the object state of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Objects are enabled or disabled based on their object state.

briefdescription.para: Set the lock level of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the dialogue choice type of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the dialogue choice topic for the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the gold pool of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the hour of the last gold restock of the temporary object stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The hour of the last gold restock.

briefdescription.para: Set the day of the last gold restock of the temporary object stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The day of the last gold restock.

briefdescription.para: Set the disarm state of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the droppedByPlayer state of the temporary object stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the object has been dropped by a player or not.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetObjectPosition

briefdescription.para: Set the position of the temporary object stored on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetObjectRotation

briefdescription.para: Set the rotation of the temporary object stored on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *soundId, double volume, double pitch) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetObjectSound

briefdescription.para: Set the summon state of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: This only affects living actors and determines whether they are summons of another living actor.

briefdescription.para: Set the summon effect ID of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the summon spell ID of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the summon duration of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the player ID of the summoner of the temporary object stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID of the summoner.

briefdescription.para: Set the refNum of the actor summoner of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the mpNum of the actor summoner of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the player ID of the player activating the temporary object stored on the server. Currently only used for ObjectActivate packets.
Set the door state of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Doors are open or closed based on their door state.

briefdescription.para: Set the teleport state of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: If a door's teleport state is true, interacting with the door teleports a player to its destination. If it's false, it opens and closes like a regular door.

briefdescription.para: Set the door destination cell of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: The cell is determined to be an exterior cell if it fits the pattern of a number followed by a comma followed by another number.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetObjectDoorDestinationPosition

briefdescription.para: Set the door destination position of the temporary object stored on the server.
Set the door destination rotation of the temporary object stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Because this sets the rotation a player will have upon using the door, and rotation on the Y axis has no effect on players, the Y value has been omitted as an argument.

briefdescription.para: Set a player as the object in the temporary object stored on the server. Currently only used for ConsoleCommand packets.
Set the refId of the temporary container item stored on the server.
Set the item count of the temporary container item stored on the server.
Set the charge of the temporary container item stored on the server.
Set the enchantment charge of the temporary container item stored on the server.
Set the soul of the temporary container item stored on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int objectIndex, unsigned int itemIndex, int actionCount) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetContainerItemActionCountByIndex

briefdescription.para: Set the action count of the container item at a certain itemIndex in the container changes of the object at a certain objectIndex in the object list stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: When resending a received Container packet, this allows you to correct the amount of items removed from a container by a player when it conflicts with what other players have already taken.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the container item.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary object to the server's currently stored object list.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary object will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

memberdef.argsstring: (int internalIndex, int intValue, unsigned int variableType) noexcept
memberdef.name: AddClientLocalInteger

briefdescription.para: Add a client local variable with an integer value to the client locals of the server's temporary object.

parameterdescription.para: The internal script index of the client local.
The variable type (0 for SHORT, 1 for LONG).
The integer value of the client local.

briefdescription.para: Add a client local variable with a float value to the client locals of the server's temporary object.

parameterdescription.para: The internal script index of the client local.
The float value of the client local.

briefdescription.para: Add a copy of the server's temporary container item to the container changes of the server's temporary object.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary container item will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

briefdescription.para: Send an ObjectActivate packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
